narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ethel Bethea is a Counselor, Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) provider based in New Haven, CT. From 2018-11 through 2019-09, this provider received $427K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 561 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending grew 715% from $47K in 2018 to $380K in 2019.
Saw a 8.1× spike in 2019 ($47K → $380K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2019-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
